description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者及社会运动人士，曾因六四事件被捕入狱，被称为六四事件的“幕后黑手”。
description.en: A Chinese dissident and social activist, who was imprisoned for his involvement in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and was labeled a 'black hand' behind the event.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明的妻子，与陈子明共同获得首届刘宾雁良知奖。
description.en: Wife of Chen Ziming, and co-recipient of the inaugural Liu Binyan Conscience Award with him.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，陈子明的出生地。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China and the birthplace of Chen Ziming.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，陈子明成长及逝世的地点。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Chen Ziming grew up and passed away.

description.zh-cn: 指争取实现民主政治的运动。
description.en: Refers to movements that advocate for the realization of democratic politics.

description.zh-cn: 一种恶性程度很高的消化系统肿瘤。
description.en: A highly malignant tumor of the digestive system.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所中学，陈子明曾在此就读。
description.en: A middle school in Beijing, China, where Chen Ziming studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国内蒙古自治区锡林郭勒盟下的一个旗，陈子明曾在此插队。
description.en: A banner under Xilingol League, Inner Mongolia, China, where Chen Ziming was a sent-down youth.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的高等院校，陈子明曾在此就读并被开除学籍。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Beijing, China, where Chen Ziming studied and was later expelled.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织。
description.en: The youth wing of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的城市广场，是多次政治事件的发生地。
description.en: A city square in Beijing, the site of numerous political events.

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1979年间，在北京西单一面墙上张贴大字报，宣传个人思想、言论的民主运动。
description.en: A democracy movement from 1978 to 1979 in which big-character posters were pasted on a wall in Xidan, Beijing, to publicize individual thoughts and speeches.

description.zh-cn: 一份创办于1979年的民运杂志。
description.en: A pro-democracy magazine founded in 1979.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的高等院校，陈子明曾在此就读研究生。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Hefei, Anhui, China, where Chen Ziming pursued his postgraduate studies.

description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，曾与陈子明在民主运动中长期合作。
description.en: A Chinese dissident who had a long-term collaboration with Chen Ziming in the democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，曾与陈子明一同当选人大代表。
description.en: A Chinese dissident who was elected as a People's Congress deputy alongside Chen Ziming.

description.zh-cn: 中国北京市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A district under the jurisdiction of Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 由陈子明等人于1985年创办的民办函授学校。
description.en: A private correspondence school founded by Chen Ziming and others in 1985.

nodes.id: 北京财贸金融函授学院

zh-cn: 北京财贸金融函授学院

description.zh-cn: 由陈子明等人于1985年创办的民办函授学校。
description.en: A private correspondence school founded by Chen Ziming and others in 1985.

nodes.id: 中国政治与行政科学研究所

zh-cn: 中国政治与行政科学研究所

description.zh-cn: 由陈子明等人于1986年成立的研究所，后被关闭。
description.en: A research institute established by Chen Ziming and others in 1986, which was later shut down.

nodes.id: 北京社会经济科学研究所

zh-cn: 北京社会经济科学研究所
en: Beijing Social and Economic Sciences Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 由陈子明和王军涛等人于1987年成立的民办研究所，在六四事件后被封闭。
description.en: A private research institute founded by Chen Ziming, Wang Juntao, and others in 1987, which was closed down after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 一份曾在中国具有较大影响力的报纸，陈子明曾任其总经理。
description.en: A once influential newspaper in China, for which Chen Ziming served as general manager.

description.zh-cn: 中国编辑，曾任《经济学周报》总编辑，并与陈子明共同创办网站。
description.en: A Chinese editor who served as the editor-in-chief of Economics Weekly and co-founded a website with Chen Ziming.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治运动，对陈子明个人命运产生了决定性影响。
description.en: A political movement that occurred in Beijing, China, in 1989, which had a decisive impact on Chen Ziming's personal fate.

description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，六四事件学生领袖。陈子明曾指其在狱中作出不实证词，但王丹也曾公开称陈子明为友人并关心其病情。
description.en: A Chinese dissident and student leader of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. Chen Ziming accused him of giving false testimony in prison, but Wang Dan also publicly referred to Chen as a friend and expressed concern for his illness.

description.zh-cn: 于1985在美国旧金山成立的组织，旨在推动中国民主。
description.en: An organization founded in San Francisco in 1985 to promote democracy in China.

description.zh-cn: 由陈子明与何家栋于2004年共同创办的网站，后被当局关闭。
description.en: A website co-founded by Chen Ziming and He Jiadong in 2004, which was later shut down by the authorities.

description.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州的首府，陈子明曾赴此地接受癌症治疗。
description.en: The capital of Massachusetts, USA, where Chen Ziming went to receive cancer treatment.

description.zh-cn: 由保护记者委员会颁发的年度奖项，表彰在新闻自由受攻击时表现出勇气的记者或其代表。
description.en: An annual award presented by the Committee to Protect Journalists, honoring journalists or their representatives who show courage in defending press freedom in the face of attacks.

description.zh-cn: 国际笔会下属的分会之一，旨在维护中文作家的言论和出版自由。
description.en: A chapter of PEN International, dedicated to defending the freedom of expression and publication for Chinese-language writers.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念中国作家刘宾雁而设立的奖项。
description.en: An award established in memory of the Chinese writer Liu Binyan.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，陈子明的国籍国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, the country of Chen Ziming's nationality.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明的妻子是王之虹。
description.en: Chen Ziming's wife is Wang Zhihong.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明于1952年1月8日出生于上海。
description.en: Chen Ziming was born in Shanghai on January 8, 1952.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明于2014年10月21日因胰腺癌在北京逝世。
description.en: Chen Ziming died of pancreatic cancer in Beijing on October 21, 2014.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明积极参加了七八十年代的多次民主运动。
description.en: Chen Ziming actively participated in multiple democracy movements in the 1970s and 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 1968年在北京八中初中毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Beijing No. 8 Middle School in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1968年至1974年，陈子明在内蒙古阿巴嘎旗插队六年。
description.en: From 1968 to 1974, Chen Ziming worked as a sent-down youth in Abag Banner, Inner Mongolia for six years.

description.zh-cn: 1974年作为工农兵学员就读于北京化工学院，1976年被开除学籍。
description.en: Enrolled in Beijing Institute of Chemical Technology as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student in 1974 and was expelled in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 因被发现在信件中批评时政，陈子明于1976年4月2日被北京化工学院开除学籍。
description.en: Chen Ziming was expelled from Beijing Institute of Chemical Technology on April 2, 1976, after being discovered criticizing politics in his letters.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明于1976年4月2日被开除共青团团籍。
description.en: Chen Ziming was expelled from the Communist Youth League of China on April 2, 1976.

description.zh-cn: 1978年，陈子明参与了北京的西单民主墙运动。
description.en: In 1978, Chen Ziming participated in the Democracy Wall movement in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，陈子明担任《北京之春》杂志的编辑。
description.en: In 1979, Chen Ziming served as an editor for the 'Beijing Spring' magazine.

description.zh-cn: 1980年考入中国科学技术大学研究生院学习分子生物学专业。
description.en: In 1980, Chen Ziming was admitted to the Graduate School of the University of Science and Technology of China to study molecular biology.

position.zh-cn: 研究生院研究生会主席
position.en: Chairman of the Graduate Student Union

description.zh-cn: 在中国科学技术大学就读期间，陈子明担任该校研究生院的研究生会主席。
description.en: While studying at the University of Science and Technology of China, Chen Ziming served as the chairman of the graduate student union of its graduate school.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明与王军涛在民主运动中长期合作，共同参与竞选、创办企业和研究所。
description.en: Chen Ziming and Wang Juntao had a long-term collaboration in the democracy movement, jointly participating in elections, and founding enterprises and research institutes.

description.zh-cn: 1980年末，陈子明与胡平等一同当选北京市海淀区人大代表。2014年陈子明抵美治病时，胡平前往机场迎接。
description.en: In late 1980, Chen Ziming, Hu Ping, and others were elected as deputies to the Haidian District People's Congress in Beijing. In 2014, when Chen Ziming arrived in the US for medical treatment, Hu Ping went to the airport to greet him.

description.zh-cn: 1980年末，当选为北京市海淀区第七届人大代表。
description.en: In late 1980, he was elected as a deputy to the 7th People's Congress of Haidian District, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明参与创办了中国行政函授大学，并担任常务副校长。
description.en: Chen Ziming participated in founding the China Administrative Correspondence University and served as its executive vice president.

relationships.target: 北京财贸金融函授学院

description.zh-cn: 陈子明参与创办了北京财贸金融函授学院。
description.en: Chen Ziming participated in founding the Beijing Finance and Trade Correspondence College.

relationships.target: 中国政治与行政科学研究所

description.zh-cn: 1986年8月，陈子明成立了中国政治与行政科学研究所，并担任副所长。
description.en: In August 1986, Chen Ziming established the China Institute of Political and Administrative Sciences and served as its deputy director.

relationships.target: 北京社会经济科学研究所

description.zh-cn: 1987年2月，陈子明与王军涛等人成立了北京社会经济科学研究所，陈子明任所长。
description.en: In February 1987, Chen Ziming, along with Wang Juntao and others, founded the Beijing Social and Economic Sciences Research Institute, with Chen serving as director.

description.zh-cn: 1988年3月，陈子明担任《经济学周报》的总经理。
description.en: In March 1988, Chen Ziming became the general manager of Economics Weekly.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明与何家栋在《经济学周报》共事，并于2004年共同创办“改造与建设”网站。
description.en: Chen Ziming worked with He Jiadong at Economics Weekly and they co-founded the website 'Gaizao Yu Jianshe' in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，陈子明被指为“幕后黑手”而受到通缉，并于1991年被判处13年有期徒刑。
description.en: After the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Chen Ziming was labeled a 'black hand', wanted by the authorities, and sentenced to 13 years in prison in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 根据陈子明在1992年出版的书籍，他指控王丹在狱中为近五百人作证时，对他作出的三个证言均有记忆错误，是违心之言。
description.en: According to a book published by Chen Ziming in 1992, he accused Wang Dan of giving three factually incorrect and insincere testimonies against him while testifying against nearly 500 people in prison.

description.zh-cn: 2013年12月20日，王丹在其社交媒体上透露其友人陈子明患癌症晚期并已住院治疗。
description.en: On December 20, 2013, Wang Dan revealed on his social media that his friend Chen Ziming was in the late stage of cancer and had been hospitalized for treatment.

description.zh-cn: 1997年1月，将陈子明选为第十一届杰出民主人士。
description.en: In January 1997, Chen Ziming was selected as the 11th recipient of the Outstanding Democrat award.

description.zh-cn: 2004年5月，陈子明与何家栋共同创办了“改造与建设”网站。
description.en: In May 2004, Chen Ziming and He Jiadong co-founded the website 'Gaizao Yu Jianshe'.

description.zh-cn: 2004年5月，何家栋与陈子明共同创办了“改造与建设”网站。
description.en: In May 2004, He Jiadong and Chen Ziming co-founded the website 'Gaizao Yu Jianshe'.

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月18日，陈子明抵达美国波士顿接受癌症治疗。
description.en: On January 18, 2014, Chen Ziming arrived in Boston, USA, to receive cancer treatment.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明于1991年获颁国际新闻自由奖。
description.en: Chen Ziming was awarded the International Press Freedom Award in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明于2013年获得独立中文笔会自由写作奖。
description.en: Chen Ziming received the Freedom to Write Award from the Independent Chinese PEN Center in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月1日，陈子明与其妻王之虹共同获得首届刘宾雁良知奖。
description.en: On January 1, 2014, Chen Ziming and his wife Wang Zhihong jointly received the inaugural Liu Binyan Conscience Award.

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月1日，王之虹与其夫陈子明共同获得首届刘宾雁良知奖。
description.en: On January 1, 2014, Wang Zhihong and her husband Chen Ziming jointly received the inaugural Liu Binyan Conscience Award.
